sentence: Lawsuits seeking to disqualify Reps. Paul Gosar and Andy Biggs and state Rep. Mark Finchem filed on behalf of a handful of Arizona voters allege that they are ineligible to hold office because they participated in an insurrection.
author: BOB CHRISTIE
title: Judge mulls lawsuit seeking to kick Trump backers off ballot

sentence: Lawsuits seeking to disqualify Reps. Paul Gosar and Andy Biggs and state Rep. Mark Finchem filed on behalf of a handful of Arizona voters allege that they are ineligible to hold office because they participated in an insurrection.
author: Via AP news wire
title: Judge mulls lawsuit seeking to kick Trump backers off ballot

sentence: Lawsuits seeking to disqualify Reps. Paul Gosar and Andy Biggs and state Rep. Mark Finchem filed on behalf of a handful of Arizona voters allege that they are ineligible to hold office because they participated in an insurrection.
author: Associated Press
title: Judge mulls lawsuit seeking to kick Trump backers off ballot

sentence: The suit, brought by a voting rights group, also named state Rep. Mark Finchem.
author: Jeffrey Rodack
title: Judge Tosses out Lawsuit Aimed at Keeping Reps. Gosar, Biggs off Ballots

sentence: A trio of lawsuits that sought to disqualify Republican Congressmen Andy Biggs and Paul Gosar and state Rep. Mark Finchem from the ballot for their alleged roles in the January 6 attack on the Capitol was dismissed Friday.
title: Judge dismisses case to disqualify Gosar, Biggs and Finchem from ballot as 'insurrectionists'
